front.title: Things to think about when Renumbering an IPv6 network

abstract.t: This memo presents a summary of scenarios, issues for considerationand protocol features for IPv6 network renumbering, i.e. achievingthe transition from the use of an existing network prefix to a newprefix in an IPv6 network. Its focus lies not in the procedure forrenumbering, but as a set of "things to think about" when undertakingsuch a renumbering exercise.
